derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from pyro- 'fire' + Greek tekhnē 'art' + -ic

means.word_mean: 1. (usually plural) a device with an explosive that burns at a low rate and with colored flames; can be used to illuminate areas or send signals etc.
1. of or relating to the craft of making fireworks;
